step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with closed fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you move.
Excellent work maintaining shoulder height as you opened your hands. Continue to relax and exhale.
Your arm extension was good, but try to keep your elbows a bit straighter next time. Remember to relax and exhale.
Great job completing the first repetition! Focus on a smooth, controlled movement throughout.
Good start to your second rep, keeping your fists closed and arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten.
Well done opening your hands and extending. Keep breathing out and relaxing your muscles.
Excellent control maintaining shoulder height. Remember to relax and exhale fully.
Good extension, but try to keep your elbows a little straighter. Continue to relax and exhale.
Fantastic job completing the exercise! You maintained good form throughout both repetitions.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms at shoulder height and focus on exhaling as you extend. Try to keep your elbows a bit straighter for even better results next time.
